description: kindergarten +‎ -er, with spelling influenced by German Kindergärtner (“kindergarten teacher”).

entries.meaning: A child who attends a kindergarten.
(rare) A person who teaches at a kindergarten.
examples: But the heart is generally larger than the creed, as was once strikingly evidenced to me by Louisa Frankenberg, a dear, devout old German kindergartner, who had learned the art of kindergartning [...]
